SELECT COUNT(a.NCRD_ID) FROM COMTN_NCRD_USER a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_NCRD b ON a.NCRD_ID = b.NCRD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER c ON a.EMPLYR_ID = c.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND a.EMPLYR_ID = #{emplyrId}
AND NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND CMPNY_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND DEPT_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT NCRD_ID AS "ncrdId" , NM AS "ncrdNm" , OTHBC_SCOPE AS "othbcScope" , CLSF_NM AS "clsfNm" , OFCPS_NM AS "ofcpsNm" , CMPNY_NM AS "cmpnyNm" , DEPT_NM AS "deptNm" , EMAIL_ADRES AS "emailAdres" , TELNO AS "telNo" , NATION_NO AS "nationNo" , AREA_NO AS "areaNo" , MIDDLE_TELNO AS "middleTelNo" , END_TELNO AS "endTelNo" , MBTLNUM AS "mbtlNum" , IDNTFC_NO AS "idntfcNo" , MIDDLE_MBTLNUM AS "middleMbtlNum" , END_MBTLNUM AS "endMbtlNum" , ADRES AS "adres" , DETAIL_ADRES AS "detailAdres" , ZIP AS "zip" , RM AS "remark" , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , FRST_REGISTER_ID AS "frstRegisterId" FROM COMTN_NCRD WHERE NCRD_ID = #{ncrdId}

SELECT COUNT(a.NCRD_ID) FROM COMTN_NCRD a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NCRD_ID, EMPLYR_ID FROM COMTN_NCRD_USER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{emplyrId}) b ON a.NCRD_ID = b.NCRD_ID WHERE (a.OTHBC_SCOPE = 'G' OR (a.OTHBC_SCOPE = 'C' AND a.TRGET_ID = #{trgetId}) )
AND a.NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND a.CMPNY_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND a.DEPT_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
